Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6693 affecting package qemu for versions less than 8.2.0-13
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-6693 affecting package qemu for versions less than 8.2.0-13. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package qemu is earlier than 8.2.0-13, affected by CVE-2023-6693
